original_text: And if someone is too poor to pay the valuation, then he shall be made to stand before the priest, and the priest shall value him; the priest shall value him according to what the vower can afford.
korean_text: 그러나 서원자가 가난하여 네가 정한 값을 감당하지 못하겠으면 그를 제사장 앞으로 데리고 갈 것이요 제사장은 그 값을 정하되 그 서원자의 형편대로 값을 정할지니라

sentences.original_text: And if someone is too poor to pay the valuation
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 어떤 사람이 너무 가난하여 평가액을 낼 수 없으면

sentences.original_text: then he shall be made to stand before the priest
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 제사장 앞에 서게 될 것이요

sentences.original_text: and the priest shall value him
according to what the vower can afford
